text: Rob Kardashian shares adorable video of Dream shouting ‘ dada ’ from her cot ( Picture : Rob Kardashian ) Rob Kardashian has taken to SnapChat to share an adorable video of his daughter Dream, shouting ‘ dada ’ from her cot. The one - year - old can be seen poking her head above the bars of her crib calling for her ‘ dada ’ who is presumably filming the clip. She looks so precious in her baby pink onsie with her curly hair framing her chubby little cheeks. Proclaiming her love for her dad, and trying to get some attention, the little one was surrounded by a number of toys including a elephant rocker, Peppa Pig and a mini piano.
